title: I Was a Shoplifter (restored, colorized) (1950, film noir, imdb score: 6.1)

sources.title: I Was a Shoplifter (restored, colorized) (1950, film noir, imdb score: 6.1)
sources.description: I Was a Shoplifter is a 1950 American film noir crime film directed by Charles Lamont and starring Scott Brady and Mona Freeman .
